jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
GoFood is the largest food delivery company in Asia, outside of China. We list more than 400k restaurants in over 80 cities across Indonesia, Thailand, and Vietnam and are soon to start operations in other countries in Southeast Asia. One of the focus areas for GoFood is to improve the ordering flow for our consumers to provide a predictable & hassle-free experience. This ensures our driver-partners and merchant partners have a seamless order experience. 

The GoFoodRisk team identifies patterns and trends in our ever-increasing transactional demands to stay ahead of the dynamic fraud landscape and implements functional and product changes in our anti-fraud system.

We are looking for a quick-learning and motivated Product Manager who obsesses over consumer problems to define the product vision and build products at scale. As a product manager, you will drive the conceptual and technical development of product ideas. You will partner with talented designers, researchers and engineers to craft beautifully simple solutions for our consumers and internal teams.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• As part of the product team, build the product vision and execute on the prioritized roadmap for your product area
  • Experience in working with Fraud and Data Science teams to help build machine learning models to detect fraud.
  • Work with engineers and designers to ship features and product improvements
  • Seek product ideas and feedback from stakeholders, gather requirements, write specs, create wireframes and workflows
  • Define clear and well-scoped requirements documents that are easily understood by technical and non-technical audiences
  • Participate in user research initiatives with the design and user research teams to understand customer problems and identify and iterate on solutions
  • Learn everything you can about our ecosystem through data and use it to drive your product decisions.
  • Collaborate with internal stakeholders in Fraud, Data Science, and business to develop launch strategy, product messaging and training

• BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience
  • At Least 5 years of experience working as a product manager on Fraud or Risk teams, ideally working on consumer-facing, large-scale products.
  • A fast learner, you’re comfortable teaching yourself new skills and can thrive in a complex and fast-paced environment.
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project.
  • You’re passionate about your customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best.
  • You know how to work with agile product development teams and are excited about identifying new ways to help your team be effective. 
  • You’re fluent in English and are a confident communicator Prior experience in building Fraud tools is great plus
  • Experience as a software engineer/developer and working with distributed teams are highly desired.
